Title: Kutty Srank: The Sailor of Hearts
Writer: Shaji N. Karun (story), Hari Krishnan (screenplay), P.F. Mathews (screenplay)
Actors: Mammootty, Kamalinee Mukherjee, Meena Kumari Perera, Padmapriya
Plot: Kutty Srank is a short-tempered, lonely, but law-abiding boatman whose work leads him to travel the back waters of Kerala. One day, when the local police station discovers an unidentified ...
